      返回PooledConnection的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Validates and configures a previously idle connection
      protected PooledConnection ConnectionPool.create(boolean incrementCounter)
      Create a new pooled connection object.
      protected PooledConnection ConnectionPool.createConnection(long now, PooledConnection notUsed, String username, String password)
      Creates a JDBC connection and tries to connect to the database.
      PooledConnection ProxyConnection.getConnection() 
      PooledConnection ProxyConnection.getDelegateConnection() 
      参数类型为PooledConnection的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void ConnectionPool.abandon(PooledConnection con)
      thread safe way to abandon a connection signals a connection to be abandoned.
      protected PooledConnection ConnectionPool.borrowConnection(long now, PooledConnection con, String username, String password)
      Validates and configures a previously idle connection
      protected PooledConnection ConnectionPool.createConnection(long now, PooledConnection notUsed, String username, String password)
      Creates a JDBC connection and tries to connect to the database.
      void JdbcInterceptor.disconnected(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con, boolean finalizing)
      Called when Connection.close() is called on the underlying connection.
      protected void ConnectionPool.disconnectEvent(PooledConnection con, boolean finalizing)
      Hook to perform final actions on a pooled connection object once it has been disconnected and will be discarded
      protected void ConnectionPool.finalize(PooledConnection con)
      Hook to perform final actions on a pooled connection object once it has been disconnected and will be discarded
      protected void ConnectionPool.release(PooledConnection con)
      thread safe way to release a connection
      void TrapException.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con)
      no-op for this interceptor. no state is stored.
      void ProxyConnection.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con) 
      abstract void JdbcInterceptor.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con)
      Gets called each time the connection is borrowed from the pool This means that if an interceptor holds a reference to the connection the interceptor can be reused for another connection.
      void DisposableConnectionFacade.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con) 
      protected void ConnectionPool.returnConnection(PooledConnection con)
      Returns a connection to the pool If the pool is closed, the connection will be released If the connection is not part of the busy queue, it will be released.
      void ProxyConnection.setConnection(PooledConnection connection) 
      protected Connection ConnectionPool.setupConnection(PooledConnection con)
      configures a pooled connection as a proxy.
      protected boolean ConnectionPool.shouldClose(PooledConnection con, int action)
      Determines if a connection should be closed upon return to the pool.
      protected boolean ConnectionPool.shouldReleaseIdle(long now, PooledConnection con, long time) 
      protected void ConnectionPool.suspect(PooledConnection con)
      Thread safe way to suspect a connection.
      protected boolean ConnectionPool.terminateTransaction(PooledConnection con)
      Terminate the current transaction for the given connection.
